Package com.circa.mrv.grs_manager.io

Class ProductRecordIO

extends java.lang.Object
    ProductRecordIO class handles I/O for NIOX product records.
    Author:
    Arthur Vargas

    • Method Detail

      • readProductRecords

        public static LinkedListRecursive<Product> readProductRecords​(java.lang.String fileName)
                                                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads product records from a file and generates a list of valid Niox products. Any invalid products are ignored. If the file to read cannot be found or the permissions are incorrect a FileNotFoundException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file to read product records from
        Returns:
        product a list of valid Courses
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be found or read

      • readLine

        public static Product readLine​(java.lang.String nextLine)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Reads the value fields from the string and constructs an instance of Product class.
        Parameters:
        nextLine - the line that is to be processed
        Returns:
        p a product constructed from the line
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameters are not in the correct order or if there is an incorrect number of parameters.

      • writeProductRecords

        public static void writeProductRecords​(java.lang.String fileName,
                                       LinkedListRecursive<Product> products)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the given list of products to a text file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of file to write products to
        products - list of products to write
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file can not be written to
